pli-tv-bi-vb-np3:2.1.8: The six are linen, cotton, silk, wool, sunn hemp, and hemp; see {MS.3.1595}. | According to [](MS.3.1680) this means not smaller than 8 by 4 _sugataṅgula_, or 40 by 20 cm based on my calculation of the _sugataṅgula_, “the standard fingerbreadth”, as 5 cm. For further explanation, see comment at _bhikkhu-saṅghādisesa_ 6.
